channel.title: regression on BNU-Statistics with R
channel.description: Recent content in regression on BNU-Statistics with R

item.title: Week 1: Introduction
item.description: Why R R is one of the most complex and sofisticated statistical softwares. The current acceptance of the software is high. There are infinite number of applications from R from linear regression, books, journals and APPs in the last few years. Scientists are constantly updating the program and all the packages for us to find it easier to interact with it. In these documents we will provide you with the code required to replicate the main graphs during the course in your computer the major elements of the code with some explanations of what does each element do.
